sentence.Network_en: He turned with a little nod and I watched him walk away.
sentence.Network_cn: 他边点了点头边转过身，我看着他走了。

sentence.Network_en: "Probably," agreed Hunter, with a slow nod of his head.
sentence.Network_cn: 亨特慢慢点了点头,表示赞同地说:“很有可能.”

sentence.Network_en: A quick nod of approval would have done nicely.
sentence.Network_cn: 要是当时立即点头同意就好了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 音箱厂商 ... 飞利浦( Philips) 三诺( Nod) 冲击波( Shock Wave).
网络用语大全 ... msg        Message, 消息，信息。 nod 点头（动作）。 nr 脑弱。.
打字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 打开龙头〖 widen〗 打瞌睡〖 nod;dozeoff〗 打揢,打揢儿〖 pause〗.
PETS3_资料内容_资料下载_学习资料共享网 ... nobody 没有人 nod 点(头)；点头表示 noise 噪声，吵嚷声，杂音.

list.abs: 不过这种点头之交（nodding acquaintance）十分重要，因为一旦需要深交，你知道该去哪里找它。很多深交都是这么从初交变成的。
介词（主要是to）的用法_爱问知识人 ... mention to 提及, nod to 向某人点头, report to 报告.
据印度《德干先驱报》2012年1月8日报道，乌干达北部爆发一种神秘怪病“点头病”（nodding disease），目前已经导致100多人死亡，…
It's a space ... flyers 寻人（物）海报 nod along 跟着点头 a totally separate subject 完全题外话.

jx.jx_en_mean: a slight acquaintance with a person or knowledge of a subject
jx.jx_cn_mean: （与某人）点头之交；（对某物）略知一二

lj.lj_ly: students will need &B{a nodding acquaintance with} three other languages.
lj.lj_ls: 学生需要对其他三种语言略知一二。

jx.jx_en_mean: select or approve someone or something

lj.lj_ly: they banned one book but gave the other the nod.
lj.lj_ls: 他们查禁了一本书却批准了另一本。

phrase.cizu_name: a nod's as good as a wink to a blind horse

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)used to convey that a hint or suggestion can be or has been understood without the need of further elaboration or explanation

phrase.cizu_name: on the nod Brit. informal 英，非正式

jx.jx_en_mean: by general agreement and without discussion

lj.lj_ly: parliamentary approval of the treaty went through on the nod.
lj.lj_ls: 议会点头通过了该条约。

lj.lj_ly: some of the congregation nodded off during the sermon.
lj.lj_ls: 在布道集会上有些人打起了瞌睡。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)approve by general agreement and without discussion
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)未经讨论而一致通过

lj.lj_ly: the DTI nodded through the bid from Airtours.
lj.lj_ls: 贸易工业部点头通过了空旅公司的投标。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a verb): perhaps of Low German origin; compare with Middle High German notten 'move about, shake'. The noun dates from the mid 16th cent

encyclopedia.content: nod 可以指NOD兄弟会，NOD杀毒软件也可以指单词NOD。

entry.def: If you nod, you move your head downwards and upwards to show that you are answering 'yes' to a question, or to show agreement, understanding, or approval.

example.ex: 'Are you okay?' I asked. She nodded and smiled...
example.tran: “你没事吧?”我问她。她点点头，笑了。

example.ex: David said nothing, but simply nodded, as if understanding perfectly...
example.tran: 戴维什么都没说，只是点点头，好像完全理解了。

entry.def: If you nod in a particular direction, you bend your head once in that direction in order to indicate something or to give someone a signal.

example.ex: 'Does it work?' he asked, nodding at the piano...
example.tran: “它能用吗？”他边问边朝钢琴方向扬了下头。

example.ex: She nodded towards the drawing room. 'He's in there.'...
example.tran: 她朝客厅方向扬了扬头说：“他在那里面。”

entry.tran: (用于打招呼或告别)点头，点头招呼
entry.def: If you nod, you bend your head once, as a way of saying hello or goodbye.

example.ex: All the girls nodded and said 'Hi'...
example.tran: 所有的女孩都点头招呼道：“嗨!”

example.ex: Tom nodded a greeting but didn't  say anything...
example.tran: 汤姆点头致意，但什么都没说。

entry.def: In football, if a player nods the ball in a particular direction, they hit the ball there with their head.

example.ex: Taylor leapt up to nod the ball home...
Brian McClair nodded in his twenty-third goal of the season.
example.tran: 布赖恩·麦克莱尔头球攻入了自己本赛季第23粒进球。

entry.def: If you give someone the nod, you give them permission to do something.

example.ex: 'Keep him outside till I give you the nod.'

entry.tran: (建议)一致接受地，毫无异议地
entry.def: If a proposal is accepted on the nod, it is accepted without being questioned or argued about.

example.ex: He has always argued that the party cannot be seen to let the treaty through on the nod...
example.tran: 他一直争辩，不能眼看着该党让此条约毫无异议地通过。

example.ex: Big issues are going through on the nod.
example.tran: 重大议题将会一致通过。

means.word_mean: 1. a sign of assent or salutation or command
2. the act of nodding the head
2. lower and raise the head, as to indicate assent or agreement or confirmation;

sentences.sentence: "The teacher nodded when the student gave the right answer"

means.word_mean: 3. let the head fall forward through drowsiness;

sentences.sentence: "The old man was nodding in his chair"

means.word_mean: 4. sway gently back and forth, as is in a nodding motion;

sentences.sentence: "the flowers were nodding in the breeze"
"The old man sat nodding by the fireplace"

auth_sentence.content: He paid us scant heed, beyond a nod.
auth_sentence.res_content: He paid us scant heed, beyond a nod.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He paid us scant heed, beyond a nod.

auth_sentence.content: Jove has firm'd it with an Awfull Nod.
auth_sentence.res_content: Jove has firm'd it with an Awfull Nod.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jove has firm'd it with an Awfull Nod.

auth_sentence.content: Nonbelievers had already been given the nod sort of.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nonbelievers had already been given the nod sort of.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nonbelievers had already been given the nod sort of.

sentences.en: I nodded at him in greeting.
He nodded to show that he understood.
She nodded her head when she passed me in the street.
sentences.cn: 当她在街上走过我身旁时, 向我点了点头。

sentences.en: He nodded a welcome to Mary.
sentences.cn: 他向玛丽点头表示欢迎。

sentences.en: Grandmother sat nodding by the fire.
sentences.cn: 祖母坐在火炉旁打瞌睡。

sentences.en: The judges gave the nod to the winning challenger.
sentences.cn: 裁判们对挑战者的胜利给予确认。

jushi.english: She stared at the flowers nodding in the wind.
jushi.chinese: 她凝视着随风摆动的花朵。
